<h3 id="X15811">X(15811)&nbsp;=&nbsp;CENTER OF THE TANGENTIAL PERSPECONIC OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC AND ANTI-EXCENTERS-REFLECTIONS</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (SB+SC)*(4*SA^2-16*R^2*SA+3*S^2)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(15811) = 3*X(10516)-2*X(15812)</b>
<p>X(15811) lies on these lines: {3,13474}, {4,6}, {22,11439}, {24,1620}, {25,64}, {26,11472}, {33,221}, {34,2192}, {37,12705}, {40,220}, {51,12174}, {84,1407}, {154,1593}, {155,3627}, {184,11403}, {185,5198}, {208,10374}, {225,12679}, {235,1853}, {382,13419}, {389,12315}, {394,3146}, {1350,5907}, {1495,3516}, {1596,14216}, {1597,6759}, {1598,6000}, {1750,7078}, {1763,10373}, {1829,7973}, {1856,10366}, {1899,1906}, {1995,12279}, {2256,9121}, {3066,10574}, {3089,6247}, {3197,11471}, {3357,3426}, {3515,8567}, {3523,15448}, {3543,11441}, {3575,5895}, {3763,7400}, {3832,10601}, {5059,15066}, {5085,11479}, {5878,6756}, {6180,6223}, {6225,6995}, {6353,6696}, {6642,14915}, {6807,8253}, {6808,8252}, {6823,10516}, {7398,15740}, {7487,15311}, {7529,10575}, {7530,12163}, {8681,11477}, {9707,13596}, {9833,13488}, {9924,12294}, {10117,12133}, {10541,10984}, {10594,10605}, {11017,13154}, {11414,15030}, {11430,14530}, {11438,13093}, {11807,12308}, {12082,15058}, {12161,15687}, {12324,13567}, {14490,14528}</p>
<p>
X(15811) = reflection of X(9786) in X(1598)<br>
X(15811) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 1498, 6), (4, 5656, 12233), (4, 11456, 10982), (4, 12112, 7592), (24, 10606, 1620), (25, 64, 1192), (25, 11381, 64), (1181, 10982, 1199), (1199, 11456, 1181), (3426, 3517, 3357), (6225, 6995, 13568), (10594, 12290, 10605), (12164, 13598, 11477)<br></p>
